title: Websites display mobile view on Desktop
content: The browser on my MacBook Pro running Fiorefox 85.0.2 on Mojave 10.14.6 displays some webpages in mobile view. How do I change it back to desktop view.

title: AntiPwny shows FF process as infected by meterpreter.
content: By running an AntiPwny scan, the only process in the system that shows suspicious activity is FF. So i reinstalled FF with all addons disabled, the only addon i installed on top is LastPass. Ran the scan again, and the same thing happens.

title: Bookmark Toolbar drops down everytime I bookmark a site
content:
Its really annoying can someone please tell me what I have to do so when i bookmark a site again it does not drop down the bookmark toolbar

I sent an image showing the bookmark toolbar which appears every time i book mark a site i circled each bookmark in the tool bar with red, I circled the bookmark window purple all i want to appear is the bookmark windows asking me where would i like to store this bookmark i do not want the bookmark toolbar appearing every time i bookmark a site

it is very annoying please help!
creator: thespiankyle550086

title: Navagating all the benefits of Firefox.
content:
Hi,

I'm a bit old and really need someone nearby to come show me how to navigate into your securities and other benefits, someone who really knows all this. Is that possible? I get confused by the complexities of everything you offer.

For example, I read something about Ad blocker which said it wants access to all my inforamation- does that mean they want all my bank numbers for trading stocks? That would seem ridiculous, no?

It would also be time to make a small donation to assist your existence. How?

Thank you, Doug Calder [phone number] and you have the rest.
creator: calder1

title: No me sincroniza mis datos de mi anterior session de firefox sync
content: sincronice anterior mente en mi ordenador, formatie el equipo intale de nuevo firefox me logie pero no se sincronizo normalmete , antes solo iniciaba session y apretaba sincronizar y me cargaban todos los datos guardados anteriormente pero ahora no cargo nada, esta desde cero, y no hay ningun lugar de soporte o ayuda, y los que has de preguntas frecuentes estan obsoletos desde el 2015 y siempre me redirigue ahi , que puedo hacer ?

title: firefox is not running on Windows 10 , require only compatible mode
content:
The mozilla firefox stop working suddenly on Windows 10, i tried almost everything and i was not being able to fix it. What i did is :

1. Started firefox in safe mode 2. Uninstalled compeletely firefox and then tried to install it, on end of installation was getting the error the application was unable to start correctly (0xc000000d) 3. checked about:crashes is not possible because only allow you to write and nothing else happens if you press enter stays as it is

Somehow firefox installed and i am only able to start it on compatible mode, how can i fix the problem and see what it happens?

Running in compatible mode breaks the visual on full screen also.
creator: reffertzy_a109f
